title: RemoteSolrExceptions thrown from HttpSolrServer should include the URL of the remote host
description: All very well telling me there was an error on a remote host, but it's difficult to work out what's wrong if it doesn't tell me which host the error was on...

comments.author: Alan Woodward
comments.content: Patch, adding a 'remoteHost' parameter to the RemoteSolrException constructor.
